thread.title: Take up state’s issues with Modi, CM tells MPs
thread.title_full: Take up state’s issues with Modi, CM tells MPs

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Take up state’s issues with Modi, CM tells MPs
text:
Tribune News Service
Dehradun, October 17
Chief Minister Harish Rawat has appealed to all five MPs from the state to urge Prime Minister Narendra Modi to ensure that justice is done to Uttarakhand with regard to sanctioning of funds. Rawat said he met the Prime Minister recently and sought more funds for the state. He said he got a convincing response from the Prime Minister and was hopeful of a positive outcome. He said it was strange that all five MPs belonging to the BJP were more interested in making irrelevant statements in Uttarakhand than using their good offices with the Prime Minister to get justice done to the state.
